playlists.name: Marvel Movies
playlists.desc: Marvel Cinematic Universe: a world of heroes, villains, and epic battles that have captivated audiences worldwide. From Iron Man's first suit to Spider-Man's web-slinging acrobatics, the Marvel movies have brought our favorite comic book characters to life on the big screen. Join the Avengers as they battle against Thanos to save the universe, or witness the rise of the Black Panther and the introduction of the first female-led Marvel movie, Captain Marvel. With breathtaking action sequences and a star-studded cast, the Marvel Cinematic Universe is a thrilling adventure that will leave you on the edge of your seat.

movies.title: The Guardians of the Galaxy Holiday Special
Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings

playlists.name: Harry Potter marathon
playlists.desc: Harry Potter, the boy who lived, takes us on a thrilling adventure into the world of magic, where the impossible becomes possible. Join Harry, Hermione, and Ron as they battle against the dark forces of Voldemort, explore the mysterious Hogwarts castle, and uncover ancient secrets of the wizarding world. With spells, potions, and magical creatures at every turn, the Harry Potter movies will enchant and captivate you until the very end. Discover the magic for yourself and enter the wizarding world of Harry Potter!

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

playlists.name: Middle Earth Journey
playlists.desc: In a world of magic and danger, the fate of Middle-earth lies in the hands of a small group of heroes. Join Frodo, Gandalf, and Aragorn as they journey through epic battles and treacherous landscapes to destroy the One Ring and defeat the forces of darkness. Follow Bilbo as he sets out on a quest to reclaim the Dwarf Kingdom of Erebor, encountering trolls, goblins, and dragons along the way. With stunning visuals and heart-pumping action, the Lord of the Rings and Hobbit series will transport you to a world of adventure you'll never forget.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies
The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug

playlists.name: Star Wars galaxy
playlists.desc: A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away... Follow the epic journey of the Skywalker family, a band of rebels, and a lovable band of droids as they battle against the evil Empire and their fearsome Sith Lords. With lightsabers, the Force, and plenty of interstellar action, the Star Wars saga takes viewers on an unforgettable adventure through the vast expanse of space.

movies.title: Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker
Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones

playlists.name: Enter the Matrix
playlists.desc: In a world controlled by artificial intelligence, one man discovers the truth and fights to free humanity from their virtual prison. The Matrix is a mind-bending journey through a dystopian future, filled with action, philosophy, and groundbreaking special effects. Follow Neo as he navigates the thin line between reality and illusion, and the fate of the human race hangs in the balance.

playlists.name: Twilight Saga
playlists.desc: In the town of Forks, Washington, a teenage girl named Bella Swan falls in love with a mysterious boy named Edward Cullen. But Edward and his family are not what they seem - they are vampires. As Bella gets drawn deeper into Edward's world, she discovers a world of danger, romance, and forbidden love that she never knew existed. With werewolves, rival vampire clans, and a love triangle that spans generations, the Twilight series is a thrilling and heart-wrenching tale of love, sacrifice, and the struggle to belong.

movies.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 2
The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 1

playlists.name: John Wick movies
playlists.desc: John Wick is a gripping action-packed movie series that follows a retired hitman seeking vengeance after the death of his beloved dog. With non-stop thrilling sequences and a heart-pumping soundtrack, this epic tale of revenge takes you on a high-octane ride through the dark and dangerous underworld of assassins, where Wick will stop at nothing to protect what's left of his shattered life. Get ready to witness the ultimate killing machine in action as he seeks justice, one bullet at a time.

playlists.name: Batman collection
playlists.desc: Get ready for an action-packed adventure with the Dark Knight! Join us for our Batman movie marathon and experience the excitement of Gotham City with all your favorite characters. From the iconic Michael Keaton to the brooding Christian Bale, this event has something for every fan of the Caped Crusader. Don't miss out on this thrilling cinematic journey through the Batman universe!

movies.title: Batman: The Dark Knight Returns, Part 1
Batman: The Dark Knight Returns, Part 2

playlists.name: Pirates of the Caribbean
playlists.desc: Ahoy there matey! Ready to embark on a swashbuckling adventure on the high seas? Then set sail with the notorious Captain Jack Sparrow and his motley crew as they search for treasure, battle deadly enemies, and navigate through treacherous waters in the epic Pirates of the Caribbean series. From cursed Aztec gold to the Fountain of Youth, there's no shortage of excitement and danger in this thrilling franchise. So hoist the Jolly Roger and join the crew, but beware, for danger and adventure await at every turn!

movies.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides
Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End
Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales
